TopicTitle: "Let it Crash", KSP Parody of "Let it Go" from Frozen

Articles.Content:
[CHORUS]

Let it crash, let it blow

Watch as the sun shines through the hole

Let it crash, let it blow

Look to Kerbin and say goodbye....

[VERSE 1]

The moondust shines on the plains tonight

Not a figure to be seen

A single kingdom on another planet

And it looks like IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m the only Queen

The lander lays in ruins somewhere to the side

CouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t land at all, but atleast they knows I tried

DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t acclerate, don't overbrake

Land the lander, the crew depends on you

Slow descent, quick ascent, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t crash it all

Well now its trashed

[CHORUS]

Let it crash, let it blow

Tell CAPCOM the bad results

Let it crash, let it blow

Look to Kerbin and say goodbye

And here I am

And forever I shall stay

Let it crash, let it blow

Chance of death never bothered me anyway

[VERSE 2]

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s funny how millions of miles

Makes our home planet seem small

And the politicians that once controlled me

CanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get at me at all

Up here alone, safe and sound

I finally can breathe

I know I'm right about to die, but I'm too relieved to grieve

[CHORUS]

Let it crash, let it blow

Look for survivors among the ruins

Let it crash, let it blow

Turn to Kerbin and whisper goodbye

And here I lay

Forever I shall stay

Let it crash, let it blow

Chance of death never bothered me anyway

[bRIDGE]

Standing, in space. With the life I've chosen

You won't, find me, its way too late to guide me

Buried, in the lunar dust.....

[CHORUS]

Let it crash, let it blow

Can't stay silent like this anymore

Let it crash, let it blow

Blow up the engine and slam the door

For here I lay

Forever I shall stay

Let it crash, let it blow

Chance of death never bothered me anyway...

-END TRANSMISSION-

Might write up a whole plotline for a movie called "Launched"

Edited January 22, 2014 by NASAFanboy

This is.... beautiful.

Only the muses could craft such a hysterical piece. It fits perfectly, I must commend you.
